author: Samuel Spade
subject: Lupin Game
body:
Hi everybody,

I thought some of you might like to hear about something I found. I picked up this Lupin game in Oyama and I thought it was for the MSX; it turned out to be for a game system by Epoch called the Super Cassette Vision. I found a system and plugged the game in, it has an 8-bit feel like something on the CollecoVision.

D

_____________________________________________________________
